channel.title: Cameron on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Cameron on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce

item.title: Status Update July 17, 2018
item.description: Sue made us blueberry pancakes for breakfast. Cassandra took Lesa to see their parents’ grave site, we’re going to buy a stone. Took kids to Walmart for birthday cards, Dwyane 6, Lesa 36. Took Cameron and Keaton to Council Grounds with us, hiked, swam on beach. Dwyane’s BD party.

item.title: Status Update July 15, 2018
item.description: Kids woke everyone! Journey Church, Ashley afraid, cried? Hiked River Bend Trail in Merrill, found 10 Merrill Rocks, kids enjoyed. Culver’s ice cream. Walmart for supplies, restocked Sue’s pantry. Kids swam. I took nap. Family dinner, Darrell grilled. Swam more. Paddington movie.

item.title: Status Update July 14, 2018
item.description: Left for Wisconsin early, thunderstorms and lunch in Illinois, rained off and on until Stevens Point, road construction entire way but we made good time, kids did good traveling but got bored last couple of hours. Merrill, family! Kids rode riding cars/bikes, swam. Rough bedtime.
